item.title: [pi] bank help
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Go learn common sense, it will help you solve your problems. Write a command to open you bank. Look in the PlayerAssistant class, and find the method for the banking, make the command execute that method.

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] bank help
item.dc:creator: @foufos foufos
item.description:
@foufos wrote:

hello i kind of need help with my bank it dont seem to open at all and i dont kno wat to do its a pi base 317 any feedback would be helpful thanks

this is my bank in playerassistance class

public void openUpBank(){ synchronized { if(c.getOutStream() != null && c != null) { c.getItems().resetItems(5064); c.getItems().rearrangeBank(); c.getItems().resetBank(); c.getItems().resetTempItems(); c.getOutStream().createFrame(248); c.getOutStream().writeWordA(5292); c.getOutStream().writeWord(5063); c.flushOutStream(); } } }

and this is my bank command

if (playerCommand.startsWith("bank") && c.playerRights >= 3) { c.getPA().openUpBank(); }

Read full topic
